content.text:
# Rothwell (ward)

| party1      = Liberal Democrats
|councillor2 = Stewart Golton
| party2      = Liberal Democrats
| councillor3 = Conrad Hart-Brooke
| party3      = Liberal Democrats
| population     = 15,821
| population_ref = (2023 electorate)
| area_total_km2 =
| area_footnotes =
| hide_services = yes
}}
Rothwell is an electoral ward of Leeds City Council in south east Leeds, West Yorkshire, including the town of the same name and the villages of Carlton, Oulton and Woodlesford.
